name: workflow
description: An advanced workflow setup for frontend projects.
author: Gyo Piazza <gyopiazza@gmail.com>
todo: Change sprite.js so that it saves the SCSS in the src dir before the compilation, and the HTML somewhere else

scripts.postinstall: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
scripts.uglify_old: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.icons--to-delete: svgo -f src/img/icons && mkdir -p dist/img && svg-sprite-generate -d src/img/icons -o dist/img/icons.svg
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js_old: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:images: npm run sprite && npm run imagemin
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
